subtitles:
{"ar":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"‫انسَ المساعدة في التصويب، وانسَ المنطقة غير النشطة."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.183000000","text":"حان وقت التصويب بكلتا اليدين
باستخدام عناصر تحكم الجيروسكوب الجديدة والمطورة من Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.233000000","text":"شاهد كيف أحرك الكاميرا
 بتحريك وحدة التحكم فحسب"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"يمكن أن يكون التصويب بالجيروسكوب رائعًا لكل شيء
بدءًا من تعديلات التصويب الطفيفة وحتى التمريرات السريعة والدقيقة"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","text":"سواء كنت تريد الإمساك بوحدة التحكم
 بوضع عمودي أو مسطح أو بطريقة تجمع بينهما."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","text":"ستجد أن عناصر تحكم الجيروسكوب
 الجديدة من Fortnite"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"تمنحك تحكمًا طبيعيًا حقًا
 بالكاميرا وبسلاحك."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"أفضل الثبات الإضافي
 الذي يوفره الإمساك بوحدة التحكم في وضع مسطح،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.333000000","text":"فلننتقل إلى العرض العلوي
 لوحدة التحكم حتى تتمكن من رؤية ما أفعله."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"بداية من مستوى بسيط في التحكم الإضافي
 يتاح عندما تحتاج إليه"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"إلى شيء يمكنه أن يغير الطريقة التي تنظر بها
 في عالم اللعبة تغييرًا جذريًا"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.033000000","text":"لدى Fortnite مجموعة كبيرة
 من الخيارات الجديدة."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.366000000","text":"فلنلقِ نظرة سريعة
 على ما يمكنك فعله"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"إذا قمت بتفعيل عناصر تحكم الجيروسكوب
 ولم تغير أي شيء آخر."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.049000000","text":"فلن يكون تصويب الجيروسكوب مفعلًا
 عند الضغط على زر التصويب"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","text":"أو في أثناء تعديل بناء."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","text":"بهذه الطريقة، لا داعي للقلق بشأن كيفية
 تحريك وحدة التحكم الخاصة بك"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"خلال اللعب العادي، ولكن يمكنك تفعيله
 في أي وقت تحتاج إليه."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"بالطبع، لا يزال التصويب باستخدام
 أذرع التحكم يعمل كالمعتاد."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"حتى عندما يُفعل الجيروسكوب،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"لا يزال بإمكان اللاعبين استخدام ذراع التحكم
 لحركات الكاميرا الكبيرة"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.833000000","text":"والاعتماد فقط على الجيروسكوب في التصويب الدقيق
 أو في تتبع هدف متحرك."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.283000000","text":"هناك لاعبون آخرون يفضلون
 أن يكون الجيروسكوب مفعلًا دائمًا."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","text":"إذا كانت هذه هي الطريقة التي تلعب بها،
 فسيكون من الرائع دائمًا"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.883000000","text":"تخصيص عناصر التحكم
 ليكون لديك زر معدِّل الجيروسكوب."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"سيؤدي الضغط المستمر على زر معدِّل الجيروسكوب إلى تعطيل الجيروسكوب"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:22.916000000","text":"لذلك يمكنك تغيير موضع عناصر التحكم
 دون العبث بالكاميرا."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","text":"عند اللعب بهذه الطريقة،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","text":"يمكنك حتى إلغاء ذراع التحكم تمامًا"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","text":"إذا كنت تريد ذلك حقًا،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.866000000","text":"ولكن فلنجرب شيئًا مختلفًا باستخدام الذراع.
عند تفعيل عناصر تحكم الجيروسكوب،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.699000000","text":"يكون لديك أيضًا الخيار
 لاستخدام ذراع التمرير السريع."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.716000000","text":"يتيح ذراع التمرير السريع تحريك الكاميرا
 عن طريق تدوير الذراع"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.582000000","text":"عند توجيه الذراع
 أولًا في أي اتجاه."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.466000000","text":"ستتحرك بسلاسة وبسرعة
 لمواجهة هذا الاتجاه."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"على سبيل المثال، اسحب الذراع إلى الخلف
 لتنظر خلفك بسرعة"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","text":"أو إذا كنت تتعرض لإطلاق النار،
 وجه الذراع في هذا الاتجاه"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.382000000","text":"لترى اتجاه إطلاق النار ودع تصويب الجيروسكوب
يتولى بقية الأمور."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.099000000","text":"بمجرد تفعيل الذراع،
 سيؤدي تدويرها إلى تدوير الكاميرا"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"وبهذا يمنحك التمرير السريع
 وتدوير الذراع،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.582000000","text":"تحكمًا سريعًا ومباشرًا
 في تحركاتك في جميع الأوقات."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"الآن، نظرًا إلى أن ذراع التمرير السريع
 يستخدم نطاق ذراع التحكم بأكمله"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"لتحريك الكاميرا يمينًا ويسارًا،
 فهو لا يمنحك أي مجال للنظر إلى أعلى وأسفل."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","text":"لذا، يستلزم ذراع التمرير السريع
 تفعيل عناصر تحكم الجيروسكوب،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.482000000","text":"وأنا أوصي اللاعبين المستخدمين
 لذراع التمرير السريع بتفعيل تصويب الجيروسكوب دائمًا"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.782000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","text":"أو تعديل أسلوب التحكم
 بحيث استخدام ذراع التمرير السريع"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"يفعّل الجيروسكوب، وحينها يمكنهم النظر
  إلى أعلى وأسفل عندما يريدون."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","text":"بالطبع، كلما تغير عناصر التحكم
 الخاصة بك تغييرًا جذريًا،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"ستحتاج إلى التدريب على استخدامها
 حتى تعتاد عليها."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"بينما تجرب هذه الخيارات الجديدة
 وتكتشف الطريقة الأفضل بالنسبة إليك،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"من الأفضل أن تتدرب
 في معمل المعركة، أو في الأوضاع الإبداعية"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","text":"أو على الأقل في الإحماء ضد الحياة البرية
 والشخصيات غير القابلة للعب"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.132000000","text":"قبل أن تورط نفسك في الصعاب."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.599000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","text":"تفقد مدونة Fortnite
 لمزيد من التفاصيل حول الخيارات المتاحة."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.699000000","text":"أنا Jib Smart، متخصص المدخلات والجيروسكوب
 ومخترع ذراع التمرير السريع."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:49.915000000","text":"استمتعت كثيرًا بالعمل مع Epic
 لتقديم هذه الخيارات في Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:51.765000000","text":"لا أطيق الانتظار لرؤية ما ستفعله باستخدامها."}],"de":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Die Zielerfassungshilfe und Totzonen sind passé."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.183000000","text":"Mit Fortnites neuer Gyroskop-Steuerung
nehmt ihr das Zielen selbst in die Hand."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.633000000","text":"Seht ihr, wie ich die Kamera bewege,
nur durch Drehen des Controllers?"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"Mit dem Gyroskop-Zielen könnt ihr
genauer zielen oder euch schnell umdrehen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","text":"Ihr könnt den Controller dabei
so halten, wie ihr das wollt."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","text":"Die neue Gyroskop-Steuerung
in Fortnite lässt euch die"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"Kamera und eure Waffe
völlig natürlich steuern."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"Ich lege meinen Controller für noch
mehr Stabilität flach in den Schoß,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.633000000","text":"deswegen zeige ich euch meinen Controller
jetzt mal aus der Vogelperspektive."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"Fortnite bietet euch jede Menge
neuer Steuerungsmöglichkeiten,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"von kleinen Anpassungen
in entscheidenden Momenten"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.333000000","text":"bis hin zu einer völlig neuen Art,
euch in Fortnite umzusehen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.966000000","text":"Sehen wir uns die neue
Steuerung doch mal im Detail an:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"Wenn ihr die Gyroskop-Steuerung einschaltet
und sonst nichts ändert,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.049000000","text":"ist das Gyroskop-Zielen nur aktiv,
wenn ihr die Zielen-Taste drückt"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","text":"oder ein Gebäude bearbeitet."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","text":"So könnt ihr euren Controller
beim Spielen weiter normal bewegen,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"denn die Gyroskop-Steuerung wird
nur aktiviert, wenn ihr sie braucht."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.583000000","text":"Das Zielen mit dem Umseh-Stick
funktioniert weiterhin völlig normal,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"auch bei aktiver Gyroskop-Steuerung."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"Die Spieler können die Kamera
mit dem Umseh-Stick schnell bewegen"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.833000000","text":"und die Gyroskop-Steuerung nur zum
präzisen Zielen und Schießen nutzen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.583000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.183000000","text":"Vielleicht soll die Gyroskop-Steuerung
bei euch immer aktiv sein?"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","text":"In diesem Fall empfiehlt es sich,
eure Steuerung anzupassen,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.083000000","text":"sodass ihr eine eigene Taste
für den Gyroskop-Modifikator habt."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"Wenn ihr diese Taste drückt,
wird die Gyroskop-Steuerung deaktiviert,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.316000000","text":"sodass ihr den Controller neu ausrichten
könnt, ohne die Kamera zu drehen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","text":"Auf diese Weise
könntet ihr sogar völlig auf den"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","text":"Umseh-Stick verzichten,
aber wir wollen hier etwas"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.866000000","text":"anderes mit dem Umseh-Stick versuchen.
Bei aktivierter Gyroskop-Steuerung"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.699000000","text":"könnt ihr euch auch den
Flick Stick zunutze machen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.716000000","text":"Durch Drehen des Flick Sticks
könnt ihr die Kamera bewegen,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.482000000","text":"wenn ihr den Flick Stick
zunächst in eine Richtung drückt."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.466000000","text":"Tut ihr dies, dreht ihr euch
sofort in diese Richtung."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"Zieht ihr den Stick nach unten,
dreht ihr euch schnell um."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","text":"Werdet ihr beschossen,
bewegt den Stick in diese Richtung,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.382000000","text":"und lasst das Gyroskop-Zielen
den Rest erledigen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.099000000","text":"Habt ihr den Flick Stick bewegt,
könnt ihr damit auch die Kamera drehen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"Durch kurzes Bewegen
und Drehen des Sticks"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.582000000","text":"habt ihr also ständig die volle Kontrolle
über eure direkte Umgebung."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"Da der Flick Stick die gesamte
Bewegungsspanne des Umseh-Sticks nutzt,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"um die Kamera nach links oder rechts zu drehen,
könnt ihr nicht nach oben und unten sehen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","text":"Daher muss für den Flick Stick
die Gyroskop-Steuerung aktiv sein,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.582000000","text":"und ich empfehle euch, entweder das
Gyroskop-Zielen immer aktiv zu haben"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.782000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","text":"oder einzustellen, dass durch
Bewegen des Flick Sticks"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"die Gyroskop-Steuerung aktiviert wird,
damit ihr nach oben und unten schauen könnt."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","text":"Je mehr ihr die Steuerung anpasst,
desto mehr Übung benötigt ihr natürlich,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"um euch damit völlig vertraut zu machen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"Wenn ihr also diese neuen Möglichkeiten
austesten möchtet, ist es sinnvoll,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"zunächst im Kampflabor, im Kreativmodus
oder zumindest erst mal"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","text":"gegen Tiere und NPCs damit zu üben,
bevor ihr euch an schwierigere"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.332000000","text":"Kämpfe heranwagt."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.999000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","text":"Seht euch den Blog zu diesen neuen
Möglichkeiten auf der Fortnite-Webseite an."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.699000000","text":"Ich bin Jibb Smart, Input- und Gyroskop-
Spezialist und Schöpfer des Flick Sticks."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.782000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.115000000","text":"Vielen Dank an Epic für die tolle Zusammenarbeit,
um dies in Fortnite zu ermöglichen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:52.265000000","text":"Ich freue mich schon, euch damit spielen zu sehen!"}],"en":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Forget aim assist, forget dead zones."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.183000000","text":"It's time to aim with your own two hands
 with Fortnite's new and improved gyro controls."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.233000000","text":"See how I turn the camera
 just by turning the controller"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"gyro aiming can be great for everything
from slight aim adjustments to fast and precise flicks"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","text":"whether you like to hold the controller
 upright, flat or somewhere in between."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","text":"You should find that Fortnite's
 new gyro controls"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"give you a really natural command
 over the camera and over your weapon."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"I like the extra stability
 of having the controller flat in my lap,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.333000000","text":"so let's move to an overhead view of the
 controller so you can see what I'm doing."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"From a small layer of extra control,
 just when you need it to something"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"that can more drastically change
 how you look around the game world"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.033000000","text":"Fortnite has a wide variety
 of new options here."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.366000000","text":"So let's have a quick
 look at what you can do"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"if you enable gyro
 controls and don't change anything else."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.049000000","text":"Gyro aiming will only be active
 while you're pressing the aim button"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","text":"or while editing a building. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","text":"That way, you don't have to worry about
 how your moving your controller during"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"regular gameplay, but you can activate it
 whenever you need it."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"Of course, aiming with the look stick
 still works as normal."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"Even while gyro is active, "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"players can still use the look stick
 for big camera movements"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.833000000","text":"and just rely on gyro to line up a shot
 or track a moving target."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.283000000","text":"Other players like to have
 the gyro always on."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","text":"If that's how you're playing, it's
 usually a good idea"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.883000000","text":"to customize the controls
 so that you have a gyro modifier button."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"Pressing and holding the gyro modifier button will disable the gyro"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:22.916000000","text":"so you can reposition your controller
 without messing with the camera."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","text":"Playing like this,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","text":"you could even do away with the"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","text":"looks stick entirely
 if you really wanted to, but let's try"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.866000000","text":"something different with the stick.
When gyro controls are enabled,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.699000000","text":"You also have the option
 to use Flick Stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.716000000","text":"Flick stick lets you turn the camera
 by rotating the stick"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.582000000","text":"when you first point
 the stick in any direction."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.466000000","text":"You'll make a smooth and quick
 turn to face that direction."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"For example, pull the stick
 back to quickly look behind you"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","text":"or if you're taking fire, point the stick
 in that direction to see where it's"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.382000000","text":"coming from and let gyro
aim take care of the rest."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.099000000","text":"Once the stick has been engaged, rotating
 it will rotate the camera"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"so between flicking
 and rotating the stick,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.582000000","text":"this gives you fast and direct control
 over your bearing at all times."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"Now, because Flick Stick
 uses the whole range of the look stick"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"just to turn the camera left and right,
 it gives you no way to look up and down."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","text":"So Flick Stick requires
 that you have gyro controls enabled,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.482000000","text":"and I strongly recommend Flick Stick players
 either have gyro aiming"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.782000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","text":"always on or make it
 so that engaging in the Flick"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"Stick also activates gyro so they can
 look up and down whenever they need to."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","text":"Of course, the more drastically you change
 your controls, the more practice"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"it's going to take
 to get comfortable with them. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"So as you give these new options a go and
 figure out what works best for you, it's"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"probably a good idea to get some practice
 in Battle Lab, Creative Modes"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","text":"or at least warm up against wildlife
 and NPCs before getting yourself"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.132000000","text":"into too much trouble."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.599000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","text":"Check out the Fortnite
 blog for more details on the options available."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.699000000","text":"I'm Jibb Smart, Input and Gyro
 specialist and the creator of Flick Stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:49.915000000","text":"And I've so enjoyed working with Epic
 to bring these options to Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:51.765000000","text":"I can't wait to see what you do with them.
"}],"es":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.492000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Ni asistencia
de apuntado ni zonas sin uso."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.717000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.783000000","text":"Apunta tú mismo
con los controles mejorados del giroscopio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:07.216000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.633000000","text":"Mira cómo giro la cámara
solo con mover el mando."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.298000000","text":"Usa el giroscopio para leves ajustes
de apuntado y para giros rápidos y precisos."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","text":"Sin importar la posición del mando,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","text":"los nuevos controles
del giroscopio de Fortnite"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"te dan un control muy natural
sobre la cámara y sobre tu arma."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"Me gusta la estabilidad que da
el mando horizontal en mi regazo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.433000000","text":"así que miremos el mando
desde arriba para que veas qué hago."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"Desde un poco
de control adicional justo cuando lo necesitas"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"hasta algo que cambia
cómo ves el mundo en el juego,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.725000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.220000000","text":"Fortnite ofrece
muchas nuevas posibilidades."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.671000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.459000000","text":"Vamos a echarles un vistazo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"Si solo activas
los controles de giroscopio,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.295000000","text":"el apuntado con giroscopio estará activo
mientras apuntes, edites o construyas."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","text":"Así, no tienes que preocuparte
por el movimiento de tu mando"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"durante el juego normal
y puedes activarlo cuando quieras."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"El apuntado con el stick
de vista funcionará igual,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"incluso cuando
el giroscopio está activo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"Se puede usar el stick
de vista para mover la cámara"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.833000000","text":"y el giroscopio, para disparar
o seguir a objetivos en movimiento."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.851000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.375000000","text":"Otra opción es tener
el giroscopio siempre activado."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","text":"Para ello,
puedes personalizar los controles"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.883000000","text":"y establecer
un botón modificador de giroscopio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"Mantener pulsado
ese botón deshabilitará el giroscopio"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:22.941000000","text":"para que puedas mover
tu mando sin que afecte a la cámara."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:27.597000000","text":"Jugando así, puedes incluso
olvidar por completo el stick de vista."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.183000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.181000000","text":"Pero vamos a probar
algo distinto con el stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.509000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.860000000","text":"Con los controles del giroscopio activados,
puedes usar el desplazamiento rápido del stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.816000000","text":"Esta opción
te permite girar la cámara con él."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.633000000","text":"Al apuntar con él por primera vez,
haz un giro suave y rápido para mirar en una dirección."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"Por ejemplo, usa el stick
para mirar hacia atrás rápidamente"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.217000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.491000000","text":"o apunta en una dirección
para ver de dónde vienen los ataques"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.592000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.882000000","text":"y que el apuntado
con giroscopio haga el resto."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.099000000","text":"Una vez que muevas
el stick, se moverá la cámara."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"El desplazamiento rápido y los giros"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.450000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.669000000","text":"te darán un control directo
de tu orientación en todo momento."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"El desplazamiento rápido
usa todo el rango del stick"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"para girar la cámara a los lados
y no permite mirar arriba y abajo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","text":"así que precisa activar
los controles de giroscopio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:15.689000000","text":"Para usar el desplazamiento rápido,
activa el apuntado con giroscopio"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:15.993000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.477000000","text":"o permite que el desplazamiento rápido
también active el giroscopio para mirar arriba y abajo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.292000000","text":"Cuantos más cambios
hagas en los controles,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.393000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"más práctica
necesitarás para jugar a gusto."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"Para probar estas nuevas opciones
y encontrar lo que mejor te funciona,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.128000000","text":"es buena idea practicar
en el laboratorio de batalla,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.236000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.408000000","text":"los modos Creativos
o contra animales salvajes y PNJ antes de meterte en el meollo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.552000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:42.552000000","text":"Infórmate en el blog
de Fortnite sobre estas opciones."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:43.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.799000000","text":"Soy Jibb Smart, experto
en controles y creador del desplazamiento rápido."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.015000000","text":"He disfrutado
implementando estas opciones en Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:51.851000000","text":"Estoy deseando ver cómo las usáis."}],"es-419":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Olviden la asistencia de puntería y las zonas sin uso."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.183000000","text":"Es hora de apuntar con ambas manos
con los nuevos y mejorados controles del giroscopio de Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.233000000","text":"Miren cómo giro la cámara
solo con girar el control."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"El apuntado con giroscopio puede ser bueno para todo,
desde ajustes leves de puntería hasta movimientos rápidos y precisos."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","text":"Ya sea que usen el control en posición vertical,
horizontal o algo intermedio,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","text":"notarán que los nuevos controles
del giroscopio de Fortnite"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"les darán un dominio muy natural
sobre la cámara y sobre su arma."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"Me encanta la estabilidad adicional
de tener el control sobre mis piernas,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.333000000","text":"así que pasemos a una vista frontal
del control para que puedan ver lo que hago."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"Desde una pequeña capa de control adicional,
justo cuando se necesita, hasta algo"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"que puede cambiar de forma más drástica
cómo miran el mundo del juego,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.033000000","text":"Fortnite tiene una gran variedad
de opciones nuevas."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.366000000","text":"Así que echemos
un vistazo a lo que pueden hacer."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"Si habilitan los controles
del giroscopio y no modifican nada más,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.049000000","text":"solo podrán apuntar con el giroscopio
mientras opriman el botón Apuntar"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","text":"o al editar una construcción. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","text":"De esa forma, no tendrán que preocuparse
por cómo mueven su control"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"mientras juegan, pero pueden activarlo
cuando lo necesiten."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"Claro, el joystick de vista
aún funciona como siempre,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"incluso con el giroscopio activo. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"Los jugadores pueden usar el joystick de vista
para movimientos amplios de cámara"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.833000000","text":"y depender del giroscopio solo para apuntar
o rastrear a un objetivo en movimiento."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.283000000","text":"A otros jugadores les gusta
activar siempre el giroscopio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","text":"Si ese es su estilo de juego,
por lo general es buena idea"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.883000000","text":"personalizar los controles
para que tengan el botón Modificador de giroscopio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"Oprimir y mantener el botón Modificador de giroscopio deshabilitará el giroscopio"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:22.916000000","text":"para que puedan cambiar la posición del control
sin alterar la cámara."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","text":"Si juegan de esta forma,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","text":"incluso podrían prescindir"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","text":"por completo del joystick de vista
si quisieran, pero probemos"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.866000000","text":"otra cosa con el joystick.
Cuando se habilitan los controles del giroscopio"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.699000000","text":"también pueden usar
el movimiento rápido del joystick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.716000000","text":"El movimiento rápido del joystick
gira la cámara al rotar el joystick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.582000000","text":"La primera vez que apuntan
con él en cualquier dirección,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.466000000","text":"harán un giro suave y rápido
para mirar en esa dirección."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"Por ejemplo, muevan el joystick
hacia atrás para ver rápido detrás de ustedes"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","text":"o, si les disparan, apunten el joystick
en esa dirección para ver desde dónde"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.382000000","text":"y dejen que el apuntado
con giroscopio se encargue del resto."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.099000000","text":"Una vez que usen el joystick,
la cámara rotará junto con este."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"Entre mover rápido
y rotar el joystick,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.582000000","text":"esto les da control rápido y directo
sobre su dirección en todo momento."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"Como el movimiento rápido del joystick
abarca todo el rango del joystick de vista,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"el solo girar la cámara a la izquierda y derecha
impide que miren arriba y abajo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","text":"El movimiento rápido del joystick requiere
que habiliten los controles del giroscopio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.482000000","text":"Recomiendo que los jugadores
con movimiento rápido del joystick habiliten siempre"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.782000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","text":"el apuntado con giroscopio
o que consigan que el movimiento rápido"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"del joystick active el giroscopio
para que miren arriba y abajo cuando lo necesiten."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","text":"Entre más cambios drásticos
hagan a sus controles, más práctica"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"les va a tomar
para poder acostumbrarse a ellos. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"Mientras prueban estas opciones nuevas
y averiguan cuál les funciona mejor,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"quizás sea buena idea practicar un poco
en el laboratorio de batalla, el modo Creativo"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","text":"o al menos ante animales salvajes
y PNJ antes de meterse"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.132000000","text":"en demasiados problemas."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.599000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","text":"Revisen el blog de Fortnite
para averiguar más sobre las opciones disponibles."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:41.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.699000000","text":"Soy Jibb Smart, especialista en controles
y giroscopios y creador del movimiento rápido del joystick"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:49.915000000","text":"y disfruté mucho trabajar con Epic
para traer estas opciones a Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:51.765000000","text":"Estoy ansioso de ver lo que harán con ellas."}],"fr":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Oubliez l'aide à la visée et les zones mortes."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.683000000","text":"Visez des deux mains grâce aux
nouveaux contrôles gyroscopiques."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.533000000","text":"Ici, je tourne la caméra
en tournant la manette."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"La visée gyroscopique permet autant
les ajustements fins que les mouvements rapides."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","text":"Que vous teniez la manette droite,
à plat ou entre les deux,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","text":"Les contrôles gyroscopiques de Fortnite"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"permettent un contrôle naturel
de la caméra et de votre arme."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"Moi, je préfère l'avoir
à plat sur les jambes,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.333000000","text":"donc passons plutôt à
une vue du dessus."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"Des petits ajustements
en cas de besoin"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","text":"aux effets plus radicaux
sur votre vision,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.433000000","text":"Fortnite propose
de nombreuses options."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.666000000","text":"Voyons ce qu'on peut faire."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"En activant la gyroscopie
sans rien changer d'autre,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.049000000","text":"la gyroscopie s'active en
appuyant sur la touche de visée"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","text":"ou en modifiant une structure."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.016000000","text":"Cela vous permet de bouger
votre manette sans crainte"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.016000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"et de l'activer seulement si besoin."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"La visée avec le stick
d'observation ne change pas,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"même avec la gyroscopie."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"Déplacez la caméra avec
le stick d'observation"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.233000000","text":"et utilisez la gyroscopie
pour aligner un tir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.883000000","text":"Certains aiment avoir
la gyroscopie en permanence."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","text":"Si c'est votre cas,
je vous conseille"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.183000000","text":"de configurer une touche
pour modifier la gyroscopie."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"La maintenir permet de
désactiver la gyroscopie"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.216000000","text":"pour repositionner la manette
sans affoler la caméra."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","text":"Ainsi, vous pouvez même"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","text":"Ainsi, vous pouvez même"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","text":"ignorer totalement
le stick d'observation."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.866000000","text":"Mais essayons autre chose.
Quand la gyroscopie est activée,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.999000000","text":"vous disposez aussi du
mouvement rapide du stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.116000000","text":"Cela tourne la caméra
en poussant le stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.582000000","text":"En pointant le stick
dans une direction donnée,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.866000000","text":"cela tourne instantanément
la caméra dans cette direction."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.182000000","text":"Poussez le stick vers l'arrière
pour regarder derrière vous"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.516000000","text":"ou dans la direction des
joueurs qui vous tirent dessus,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.782000000","text":"puis laissez la gyroscopie
faire le reste."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.199000000","text":"Une fois le stick actionné,
le tourner pivote la caméra."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"Le mouvement rapide
et la rotation"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.582000000","text":"vous confèrent une visée
rapide à tout moment."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"Mais comme le mouvement
rapide du stick ne permet que"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"la rotation à gauche ou à droite,
impossible de regarder en haut ou en bas."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","text":"Il requiert donc
les contrôles gyroscopiques."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.782000000","text":"Je vous conseille d'activer
la visée gyroscopique"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.782000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","text":"en permanence, pour que
le mouvement rapide"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"active la gyroscopie et permette
de regarder en haut et en bas."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:25.132000000","text":"Plus vous modifiez les contrôles,
plus vous aurez besoin"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:25.132000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"de pratique pour vous y habituer."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"Pour trouver les options qui
vous conviennent le mieux,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"entraînez-vous en Labo de combat
ou dans le mode Créatif,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","text":"ou sur les animaux sauvages
et les PNJ pour limiter le risque."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.132000000","text":"ou sur les animaux sauvages
et les PNJ pour limiter le risque."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.599000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:42.516000000","text":"Consultez l'article du site
pour en savoir plus."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:42.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.899000000","text":"C'était Jibb Smart, spécialiste
des contrôles et créateur du flick stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.015000000","text":"J'ai adoré travailler avec Epic
sur ces options pour Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:51.965000000","text":"J'ai hâte de vous voir les utiliser."}],"it":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.605000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.688000000","text":"Dimenticate la mira assistita,
dimenticate le zone morte."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.713000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.773000000","text":"È ora di prendere in mano i nuovi
e migliori comandi giroscopici di Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:07.335000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.752000000","text":"Guardate come ruoto la telecamera
semplicemente ruotando il controller"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.869000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.457000000","text":"La mira giroscopica è
ottima per tutto,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.482000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.484000000","text":"dalle piccole regolazioni della mira
ai movimenti rapidi e precisi."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.157000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.957000000","text":"Che teniate il controller in verticale,
in piano o una via di mezzo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:20.138000000","text":"scoprirete che i nuovi
comandi giroscopici di Fortnite"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:20.163000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.110000000","text":"danno un controllo molto naturale
sulla telecamera e sull'arma."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.479000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.362000000","text":"Mi piace la stabilità in più che ho
tenendo il controller in grembo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.402000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.486000000","text":"perciò guardiamo il controller dall'alto
per poter vedere cosa sto facendo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.489000000","text":"Da un pochino di controllo extra
quando ne avete bisogno,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.514000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.556000000","text":"a qualcosa che può stravolgere
la maniera di guardarsi intorno nel gioco,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.765000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.012000000","text":"Fortnite ha un'ampia gamma
di nuove opzioni disponibili:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.625000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.625000000","text":"diamo una rapida occhiata
a cosa potete fare."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"Se abilitate i comandi giroscopici
e non cambiate nient'altro,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.101000000","text":"la mira con giroscopio si attiverà solo
se premete il comando di mira"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.126000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.353000000","text":"o se modificate un edificio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:52.255000000","text":"Così non dovrete preoccuparvi"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:52.280000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.690000000","text":"di come muovete il controller
durante il gioco normale,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.715000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"ma potrete attivarla
quando ne avrete bisogno."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.931000000","text":"Ovviamente, la mira con la levetta visuale
funziona ancora normalmente,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.956000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.556000000","text":"anche mentre il giroscopio è attivo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.801000000","text":"I giocatori possono ancora usare
la levetta visuale per i movimenti ampi,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.826000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.926000000","text":"e affidarsi al giroscopio per allineare
la mira o seguire un bersaglio mobile."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.936000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.336000000","text":"Ad alcuni giocatori piace avere
il giroscopio sempre attivo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:13.266000000","text":"Se è così che giocate,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:13.291000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:15.041000000","text":"è una buona idea
personalizzare i comandi,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:15.066000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.949000000","text":"e aggiungere un pulsante
di modifica giroscopio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.408000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.095000000","text":"Tenendo premuto il pulsante di modifica,
il giroscopio si disattiva,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.120000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.004000000","text":"così potete riposizionare il controller
senza pasticciare con la visuale."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.466000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:27.649000000","text":"Giocando così potreste rinunciare del tutto
alla levetta visuale, se proprio voleste,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.293000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:29.982000000","text":"ma proviamo qualcos'altro con la levetta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.593000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:32.251000000","text":"Quando i controlli giroscopici sono attivi,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:32.276000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.699000000","text":"potete anche usare
il flick stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.237000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.853000000","text":"Con questa manovra,
ruotate la telecamera ruotando la levetta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.549000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.776000000","text":"Puntando per la prima volta
la levetta in qualsiasi direzione,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.803000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.537000000","text":"vi volterete in modo fluido e veloce
in quella direzione."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.199000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.223000000","text":"Ad esempio, tirate indietro la levetta
per guardare rapidamente dietro di voi,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.279000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:48.279000000","text":"o, se siete sotto tiro,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:48.304000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.710000000","text":"puntate la levetta nella direzione
da cui arrivano i colpi,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.735000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.425000000","text":"e al resto penserà la mira giroscopica."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.010000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.260000000","text":"Una volta attivata la levetta,
ruotarla farà ruotare la telecamera,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.437000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.462000000","text":"perciò, tra movimento rapido
e rotazione della levetta,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.487000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.893000000","text":"avrete un controllo rapido e diretto
sulla visuale in ogni momento."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.793000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.826000000","text":"Ora, il flick stick utilizza l'intera
gamma di movimento della levetta visuale"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.851000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:07.451000000","text":"solo per ruotare a destra e sinistra,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:07.476000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.065000000","text":"perciò non potrete guardare
in alto e in basso."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.160000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.736000000","text":"Quindi per il flick stick devono
essere attivi i comandi giroscopici,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.761000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:13.710000000","text":"e consiglio vivamente
a chi usa il flick stick"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:13.734000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:15.961000000","text":"di avere la mira con giroscopio
sempre attiva,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:16.105000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:19.547000000","text":"o di impostarla in modo che attivare
il flick stick attivi anche il giroscopio,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:19.572000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"per guardare su e giù quando serve."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.057000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.336000000","text":"Ovviamente, più sono drastiche
le modifiche ai comandi,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.361000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.492000000","text":"più dovrete fare pratica
per sentirvi a vostro agio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.636000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.104000000","text":"Quindi, mentre provate le nuove opzioni
e scoprite cosa è meglio per voi,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.129000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.189000000","text":"forse è utile fare un po' di pratica
in Laboratorio della battaglia e Creativa,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.214000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:36.502000000","text":"o almeno scaldarsi contro
gli animali selvatici e gli NPC,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:36.527000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.169000000","text":"prima di finire nei pasticci."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.626000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:42.475000000","text":"Leggete il blog di Fortnite
per dettagli sulle opzioni disponibili."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:43.010000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.821000000","text":"Sono Jibb Smart, specialista di input

Czas celować samodzielnie
 z nowym sterowaniem żyroskopowym."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:07.346000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.799000000","text":"Mogę obracać kamerę,
poruszając kontrolerem."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.919000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"Sterowanie żyroskopowe jest świetne
