pionowo lub na płasko."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.443000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.023000000","text":"Nowe sterowanie żyroskopowe
umożliwi ci naturalne sterowanie."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.515000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.823000000","text":"Trzymam kontroler płasko,
bo lubię dodatkową stabilizację."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.470000000","text":"Ale spójrzmy na niego od góry."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.836000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"Niewielka dodatkowa kontrola
nad sterowaniem"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.989000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"lub poważniejsze
zmiany w twoim widoku z gry."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.796000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.033000000","text":"W Fortnite znajdziesz teraz wiele opcji."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.690000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.366000000","text":"Sprawdźmy, co możemy zrobić."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.590000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"Jeśli włączysz
sterowanie żyroskopowe,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.043000000","text":"będzie ono aktywne,
gdy wciśniesz przycisk celowania"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.110000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.670000000","text":"lub w trakcie edycji budowli."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.936000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.190000000","text":"Nie musisz martwić się ruchem kontrolera
w trakcie rozgrywki,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.296000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.743000000","text":"ale możesz aktywować je
w dowolnym momencie."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.183000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"Oczywiście sterowanie drążkiem
działa jak zawsze."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:00.003000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.629000000","text":"Nawet gdy żyroskop jest aktywny,
można używać drążka do szerokich ruchów"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.976000000","text":"oraz do celowania
lub śledzeniu ruchomego celu."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.377000000","text":"Niektórzy grają z zawsze
włączonym żyroskopem."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.344000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.824000000","text":"Wtedy dobrze jest dostosować sterowanie,
by mieć dostęp do modyfikatora sterowania."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.350000000","text":"Wciśnij go i przytrzymaj,
a żyroskop zostanie wyłączony"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.429000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:22.956000000","text":"Wtedy ruszysz
kontrolerem bez ruszania kamerą."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.503000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:27.589000000","text":"Grając w ten sposób,
możesz nawet zapomnieć o drążku kamery."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.303000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.049000000","text":"Spróbujmy użyć go w inny sposób."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.649000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.636000000","text":"Kiedy żyroskop jest włączony,
dostępne jest sterowanie „Flick Stick”."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.236000000","text":"„Flick Stick” pozwala sterować
kamerą, obracając drążek."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.596000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.466000000","text":"Zwróć go, a wtedy szybko 
obrócisz się w wybranym kierunku."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.224000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"Zwróć drążek w tył,
by sprawdzić, co jest z tyłu"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","text":"lub odchyl drążek
w kierunku strzałów,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.382000000","text":"a sterowanie żyroskopowe
zajmie się resztą."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.196000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.163000000","text":"Kiedy już użyjesz drążka,
przesunięcie go obróci kamerę."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.476000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"„Flick Stick”
 i wychylanie drążka"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.436000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.582000000","text":"zapewniają ci
szybką i bezpośrednią kontrolę."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.856000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.456000000","text":"Ponieważ obracając kamerę
w prawo i w lewo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.576000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.523000000","text":"korzystasz z całego zasięgu drążka,
nie możesz patrzeć w górę lub w dół"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.609000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:12.782000000","text":"Metoda ta wymaga
włączonego sterowania żyroskopowego."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:12.856000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.376000000","text":"Używającym „Flick Stick” polecam
włączenie sterowania żyroskopowego na stałe"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.462000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"lub automatyczne włączenie go
przy użyciu "Flick Stick"."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.464000000","text":"Oczywiście im bardziej zmienisz sterowanie,
tym trudniej będzie się przyzwyczaić."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.356000000","text":"W ramach testowania możesz sprawdzić,
co najbardziej ci pasuje."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.450000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"Poćwicz sterowanie w laboratorium bojowym,
trybach kreatywnych"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.436000000","text":"lub w walce ze zwierzętami i NPC,
zanim rzucisz się do regularnej walki."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.676000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:42.470000000","text":"Zajrzyj na bloga Fortnite,
by dowiedzieć się więcej."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:43.156000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.923000000","text":"Ja jestem Jibb Smart, twórca „Flick Sticka”
i specjalista od sterowania."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:47.033000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.140000000","text":"Współpraca z Epic nad tymi opcjami
w Fortnite była świetna."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.260000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:52.113000000","text":"Chętnie zobaczę, co z nimi zrobisz."}],"pt-br":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Esqueça a assistência de mira
e as zonas mortas."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.183000000","text":"Mire usando suas próprias mãos com o novo
e melhorado giroscópio do Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.233000000","text":"Veja como eu viro a câmera
apenas virando o controle."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"A Mira Giroscópica serve pra muito, sejam
ajustes da mira ou puxadas precisas..."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","text":"Não importa se você segura o controle
em pé, reto ou algo diferente."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","text":"Você verá que os novos
controles giroscópicos"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"do Fortnite conferem um comando
natural sobre a câmera e a arma."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"Eu gosto da estabilidade extra
de ficar com o controle no colo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.333000000","text":"então aqui está uma visão de cima
para você ver o que estou fazendo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"Uma camada adicional de controle,
exatamente quando você precisa,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"que pode mudar drasticamente
como olha em volta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.033000000","text":"O Fortnite tem uma variedade
de novas opções aqui."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.366000000","text":"Então, dá uma olhada
no que você pode fazer."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"Se ativar os controles giroscópios
sem mudar nada mais,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.049000000","text":"a Mira Giroscópica só será ativada
quando você usar o botão de mira"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","text":"ou quando editar uma construção."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","text":"Assim, você não precisa se preocupar
com como movimenta o seu controle"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"em outros momentos do jogo,
mas pode ativá-los sempre que precisar."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"Mirar com o Controle da Câmera
continua como antes."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"Mesmo com o giroscópio ativo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"os jogadores podem usar o Controle
da Câmera para movimentos maiores"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.833000000","text":"de câmera e usar o giroscópio
ao atirar ou rastrear alvos."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.283000000","text":"Certos jogadores preferem
ficar com o giroscópio ligado."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","text":"Se é assim que você joga,
pode ser uma boa ideia"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.333000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.883000000","text":"personalizar os controles para ter um botão
Modificador de Giroscópio."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"Apertar e segurar o Modificador
de Giroscópio desabilita"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:22.916000000","text":"o giroscópio e reposiciona o controle
sem mexer na câmera."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","text":"Jogando assim,
você pode até usar apenas"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:25.199000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","text":"o Controle de Câmera
se quiser, mas vamos tentar"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.682000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.866000000","text":"algo diferente com o controle analógico.
Com os controles giroscópicos"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.882000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.699000000","text":"você pode usar
o Giro Rápido no Analógico."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.716000000","text":"O Giro Rápido no Analógico te permite
virar a câmera girando o analógico"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.582000000","text":"Ao apontá-lo em qualquer direção,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.466000000","text":"você fará um giro suave
e rápida nessa direção."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"Por exemplo, puxe o analógico
para olhar rapidamente para trás,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","text":"ou, quando sob fogo, aponte o analógico
na direção dos tiros para ver"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.016000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.382000000","text":"de onde estão vindo
e deixe a Mira Giroscópica agir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.099000000","text":"Com o controle analógico ativado,
ao girá-lo você gira a câmera,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","text":"e, entre guinadas e rotações do analógico,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.349000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.582000000","text":"você terá um controle rápido e direto
da sua posição o tempo todo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"Como o Giro Rápido usa
o mesmo alcance que o Controle da Câmera,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"se só virar para esquerda e direita,
você não pode olhar para cima e para baixo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","text":"Então, usar o Giro Rápido requer"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.482000000","text":"os controles giroscópicos, e recomendo
ficar com a Mira Giroscópica"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.782000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","text":"sempre ativada,
ou uma configuração em que o giroscópio"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.566000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.416000000","text":"seja ativado com a Mira Giroscópica,
para poder olhar para cima e para baixo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","text":"É claro que, quanto mais drasticamente
você muda os controles,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"mais você precisará treinar
para se acostumar com eles."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"Portanto, ao experimentar as novas opções
e decidir o que é melhor para você,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"treine um pouco no Laboratório de Batalha
e no Modo Criativo,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","text":"ou pelo menos faça um aquecimento
contra a vida selvagem e os PNJs"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.282000000","text":"antes de encarar uma briga."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.599000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:43.154000000","text":"Visite o blog do Fortnite para consultar
mais detalhes sobre as opções."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:43.154000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.699000000","text":"Sou Jibb Smart, expert em giroscópio,
e criador do Giro Rápido no Analógico."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:49.915000000","text":"E gostei muito de trabalhar com a Epic
para introduzir essas opções no Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:51.765000000","text":"Estou ansioso para ver o que
vocês farão com elas."}],"ru":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Забудьте помощь в прицеливании и слепые зоны."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.683000000","text":"Пора прицеливаться своими руками
при помощи обновлённого гироскопа Fortnite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:07.216000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.633000000","text":"Смотрите, как я поворачиваю камеру
 просто наклоном геймпада:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.783000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:14.249000000","text":"гироскоп может многое,
 от небольшой корректировки прицеливания до точных и резких движений."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.133000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.949000000","text":"Неважно, держите ли вы
 геймпад в руках, лежит ли он на коленях или как-то ещё."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:17.949000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:20.081000000","text":"Новое управление с помощью
 гироскопа в Fortnite"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:20.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","text":"позволяет невероятно легко управлять
 камерой и вашим оружием."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","text":"Мне нравится устойчивость,
 когда геймпад лежит на коленях,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.333000000","text":"так что давайте взглянем на геймпад
 и посмотрим, что я делаю."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","text":"Дополнительный микроконтроль позволяет"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.899000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.449000000","text":"в корне изменить то,
 как мы смотрим на игровой мир:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.866000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.033000000","text":"в Fortnite появилось
 множество возможностей."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.466000000","text":"Давайте быстро взглянем,
 что можно сделать."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.083000000","text":"Если включить гироскоп
 на стандартных настройках,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.233000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.049000000","text":"прицеливание с гироскопом активно только
 при нажатии кнопки прицеливания"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:49.083000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","text":"или при изменении постройки."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","text":"Так вам не придётся беспокоиться
 о перемещении геймпада"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:53.816000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.549000000","text":"во время обычной игры, но вы сможете активировать
 прицеливание, когда будет нужно."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"Конечно, прицеливание джойстиком
 для обзора работает как обычно,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","text":"даже когда гироскоп активен."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","text":"Игроки могут пользоваться джойстиком для обзора,
 чтобы резко перемещать камеру,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.733000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:07.833000000","text":"а гироскоп пригодится для прицеливания
 или слежения за целью."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.283000000","text":"Некоторым нравится,
 когда гироскоп всегда включён."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:13.433000000","text":"Если это это про вас"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:13.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:16.983000000","text":"попробуйте поменять настройки управления так,
 чтобы у вас была кнопка под модификатор гироскопа."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.433000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","text":"Если нажать и удерживать её, гироскоп отключится,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.316000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.016000000","text":" и вы сможете переместить геймпад,
 не влияя на камеру."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.916000000","text":"Если играть так, то при желании"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:24.956000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:27.739000000","text":"можно обойтись вообще без джойстика для обзора."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.166000000","text":"Но давайте попробуем с ним кое-что ещё."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.590000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.958000000","text":"Когда управление с гироскопом включено,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:31.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:34.799000000","text":"у вас есть возможность
 пользоваться Flick Stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:37.716000000","text":"Flick Stick позволяет поворачивать камеру,
 вращая джойстик."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.582000000","text":"Если перед этим указать джойстиком
 в любом направлении,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:40.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:43.466000000","text":"вы быстро и плавно повернётесь
 в нужном направлении."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:46.982000000","text":"Например, потяните джойстик на себя,
 чтобы резко обернуться, или"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.416000000","text":"направьте его в сторону,
 откуда по вам стреляют,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.416000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:52.682000000","text":"а гироскоп об остальном позаботится."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.099000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.099000000","text":"Когда джойстик используется,
 при его вращении вращается и камера,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.432000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.449000000","text":"так что, вращая и
 резко двигая джойстиком,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.449000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:01.682000000","text":"вы сможете быстро и легко управлять
 движением в любой момент."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.966000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","text":"Поскольку технология Flick Stick использует
 весь функционал джойстика"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:05.732000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"только для поворота влево и вправо,
 у вас нет возможности смотреть вверх-вниз."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.766000000","text":"Для использования Flick Stick должно быть
 включено управление с помощью гироскопа,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.766000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:15.882000000","text":"и я рекомендую игрокам с Flick Stick или
 всегда использовать прицеливание с гироскопом,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:15.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:19.566000000","text":"или сделать так, что использование
 Flick Stick активирует гироскоп,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:19.766000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:21.816000000","text":"чтобы они могли смотреть вверх
 и вниз когда угодно."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","text":"Конечно же, чем сильнее
 вы меняете настройки управления,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:24.932000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","text":"тем дольше придётся
 к ним привыкать."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.616000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","text":"Так что, пока вы пробуете новые настройки
 и смотрите, что вам больше подходит,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.332000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:33.982000000","text":"есть смысл попрактиковаться
 в боевой лаборатории, творческом режиме"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","text":"или хотя бы пострелять
 в диких зверей и NPC, прежде"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:37.282000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.132000000","text":"чем ввязываться в серьёзные бои."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.599000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:42.416000000","text":"Читайте заметку Fortnite с подробностями
 о доступных возможностях."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:43.216000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.899000000","text":"Я Джиб Смарт, специалист по управлению
 с гироскопом и создатель технологии Flick Stick."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.982000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:49.915000000","text":"Мне очень понравилось работать с Epic,
 чтобы добавить эти возможности в игру."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:52.165000000","text":"Не терпится узнать, как вы будете их использовать."}],"tr":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.616000000","text":"Nişan alma yardımını, ölü alanları unutun."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.633000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.748000000","text":"Fortnite'ın yeni ve gelişmiş jiroskop kontrolleriyle
kendi ellerinizle nişan alma vakti."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:07.296000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.781000000","text":"Sadece kumandayı çevirerek
kamerayı yönetebiliyorum."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.871000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.097000000","text":"Jiroskop Hedefleme, keskin nişan almaktan
hızlı ve isabetli dönüşlere, birçok şekilde kullanışlı olabilir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.141000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.951000000","text":"Kumandayı ne şekilde tutarsanız tutun,
Fortnite'ın yeni jiroskop kontrolleri"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.976000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.407000000","text":"kamera ve silahınız üzerinde
doğal bir kontrol sağlar."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.452000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.372000000","text":"Ben kumandayı kucağımda düz
tutmanın sağladığı dengeyi seviyorum."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.397000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.298000000","text":"Ne yaptığımı görebilmeniz
için kumandaya üstten bakalım."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.683000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:33.984000000","text":"İhtiyaç anında ekstra
ufak bir kontrol sağlamaktan,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:34.009000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.703000000","text":"oyundaki kamera kontrolünüzü
kökünden değiştirmeye kadar"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.728000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.541000000","text":"Fortnite'da bir sürü yeni seçenek var."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:39.666000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.745000000","text":"Neler yapabileceğinize hızlı bir göz atalım."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:43.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.248000000","text":"Sadece jiroskop kontrollerini açıp
başka değişiklik yapmazsanız"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:46.273000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.546000000","text":"Jiroskop Hedefleme yalnızca nişan alırken
ya da yapı düzenlerken etkin olur."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:50.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.640000000","text":"Böylece sıradan oynanış anında
kumandayı nasıl tuttuğunuzu düşünmezsiniz"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:54.708000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:56.954000000","text":"ama istediğiniz zaman etkinleştirebilirsiniz."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:57.116000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.883000000","text":"Tabii bakma çubuğu eskisi gibi
çalışmaya devam eder."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:59.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.849000000","text":"Hatta jiroskop etkin olsa bile."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:01.916000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.767000000","text":"Büyük kamera hareketlerinde
bu çubuğu kullanmaya devam edebilir,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:04.835000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.816000000","text":"nişan almak ve hareketli hedefleri takip etmek
içinse jiroskobu kullanabilirsiniz."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:08.883000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:11.756000000","text":"Jiroskobu her zaman etkin de tutabilirsiniz."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:12.266000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.418000000","text":"Böyle oynayacaksanız, kontrollerinizi düzenleyerek"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:14.443000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.383000000","text":"bir Jiroskop Düzenleyici düğmesi
ayarlamanızı öneririm."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:17.422000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.473000000","text":"Bu düğme basılı tutularak
jiroskop devre dışı bırakılabilir,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:20.498000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.023000000","text":"kamera değişmeksizin
kumandanın konumu değiştirilebilir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:23.366000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.029000000","text":"Canınız isterse bakma çubuğunu
hiç kullanmayabilirsiniz bile."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:28.216000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.469000000","text":"Bakma çubuğuyla farklı bir şey deneyelim."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:30.568000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.231000000","text":"Jiroskop kontrolleri etkinken
Ani Dönüş Çubuğu da kullanabilirsiniz."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:35.310000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.376000000","text":"Bu, çevirdiğinizde kamerayı çevirmenizi sağlar."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:38.516000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.089000000","text":"Çubuğu ilk kez bir yöne çevirdiğinizde,
o yöne doğru düzgün ve hızlı bir dönüş yaparsınız."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:44.166000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.224000000","text":"Örneğin hızlıca arkanıza bakmak için
çubuğu geri çekebilirsiniz"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:47.249000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.648000000","text":"ya da çubuğu ateş aldığınız yöne aniden çekip
kamerayı döndürebilir,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:50.673000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.026000000","text":"gerisini Jiroskop Hedefleme'ye bırakabilirsiniz."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:53.138000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.386000000","text":"Çubuğu çektikten sonra çevirmek,
kamerayı normal şekilde çevirir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:56.440000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.886000000","text":"Hem ani dönüş hem de normal dönüş özelliğiyle"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:01:58.911000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.667000000","text":"çevrede olup bitenleri hızlı ve doğrudan
kontrol edebilirsiniz."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:02.849000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:07.493000000","text":"Ani Dönüş Çubuğu, kamerayı sadece
sağa ve sola çevirmek için kullanıldığından"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:07.518000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.116000000","text":"yukarı ve aşağı bakmanızı engeller."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:09.141000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.691000000","text":"Bu yüzden bu ayar için
jiroskop kontrolleri etkin olmalıdır."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:11.741000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.783000000","text":"Çubuğu kullanan oyuncuların
yukarı ve aşağı bakabilmeleri için"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:14.808000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.807000000","text":"ya Jiroskop Hedefleme'yi
her zaman açık olarak ayarlamalarını"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:17.832000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.026000000","text":"ya da çubuk ile jiroskop etkinleştireceği
şekilde ayarlamalarını öneririm."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:22.082000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.561000000","text":"Tabii ayarlarınızı ne kadar değiştirirseniz
alışmanız için o kadar pratik yapmanız gerekir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:26.647000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.024000000","text":"Bu yeni seçenekleri deneyip
hangisini sevdiğinize karar verirken"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:30.118000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:34.964000000","text":"Savaş Laboratuvarı, Kreatif modlar ya da en azından
vahşi hayvanlara karşı alıştırma yapıp"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:35.032000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:38.927000000","text":"gerçek savaşta hazırlıksız yakalanmamak
iyi bir fikir olabilir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:39.599000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:42.942000000","text":"Seçenekler hakkında detaylar için
Fortnite'ın blog yazısına göz atın."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:43.026000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.918000000","text":"Ben kontrol ve jiroskop uzmanı
ve Ani Dönüş Çubuğu'nun mucidi Jibb Smart."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:46.943000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.157000000","text":"Bu seçenekleri Fortnite'a getirmek için
Epic'le çalışmaktan çok mutlu oldum."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:02:50.182000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:02:52.766000000","text":"Bunlarla yapacaklarınızı dört gözle bekliyorum."}]}
